useCase.name: User Authentication and Help Links Retrieval
useCase.trigger: User authenticates and requests help links.

mainSequence.step: User authenticates through the Authentication Service.
Authentication Service validates credentials with the Database to verify the permissions and grants access.
Database confirms the validity of the User's credentials.
Authentication Service notifies the User about the successful authentication process.
User requests the display of help links via the Help Link Service.
Help Link Service retrieves relevant contextual links from the Database.
Database sends back the requested contextual links to the Help Link Service.
Help Link Service displays the retrieved help links to the User.
